title: The master will show you the ropes
review:
Arabella Childs (Keely Cat Wells ) desires to be a designer and can not break into the industry. In order to pay the bills, she becomes a personal shopper for Marylin Blacklock-Charterhouse (Claudine-Helene Aumord). Marilyn writes erotic novels for women and spends all day doing research while her husband is away. Arabella gets involved.

This film runs on the success of "50 Shades..." i.e. female soft porn. Like 50 Shades the acting and writing were a joke.

Guide: F-word, sex, and nudity (Claudine-Helene Aumord, Keely Cat Wells, Tiffany-Ellen Robinson + extra)

title: ACTING?
review: This is some of the worst acting i have seen in years. None of the actors fits their parts and they all speak like they are reading their lines from a script in a theatre rehearsal... waste of bloody time.

title: Norm MacDonald branching out into a new genre
review: Norm MacDonald attempts a new kind of role, which didn't really work out. If you are a deeply closeted gay man, this movie is not for you.
